description.p: Extract the minutes from a date or time value.
Returns the minutes from a date or time value.

discussion.p: The Minute function gets the minutes from a date or time value.

example.caption: Minute() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Now() AS Now, Minute(Now()) AS Later FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:42:48 00 pm|42
